name: gui-cpp-cef
description: Desktop GUI application using C++ with Chromium Embedded Framework

files.html/index.html:
C++ CEF Application

Platform:
files.CMakeLists.txt:
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20)
project(${PROJECT_NAME})

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)

# Find CEF
find_package(CEF REQUIRED)

# Add executable
add_executable(${PROJECT_NAME} src/main.cpp)

# Link CEF
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} ${CEF_LIBRARIES})

# Copy HTML files
file(COPY html DESTINATION ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR})

# Add tests
enable_testing()
add_subdirectory(tests)
files.tests/features/gui.feature:
Feature: CEF Desktop Application
  Scenario: Application starts successfully
    Given the CEF application is launched
    When the main window appears
    Then the title should be "${PROJECT_NAME}"
    
  Scenario: Button interaction
    Given the application is running
    When I click the "Click Me" button
    Then I should see "Hello from CEF!"
